newsitem.title: USA: Verity Inc sees Q4, FY97 net loss.
newsitem.headline: Verity Inc sees Q4, FY97 net loss.

text.p: Verity Inc said it expects to post a net loss in the fourth quarter and for the fiscal year ended May 31.
The company said it also expects to report fourth-quarter revenues of about $11.1 million and full year revenues of about $42.6 million.

Verity, a provider of search and retrieval applications for enterprise and the Internet, did not say why it anticipated posting a loss. It was not immediately available for comment, but said in a statement that it plans to release the results around June 23.
In the prior year's fourth quarter, Verity reported a net loss of $1.78 million, or $0.58 per share, on revenues of $4.22 million.
